name: 劉明傑
objective:
(1) 基本儀器介紹；(2) 戴維寧定理；(3) 電阻 - 電容移相電路；(4) 電阻 - 電容 - 電感諧振電路；(5) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(6) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(7) 發光二極體驅動電路；(8) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(9) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(10) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(11) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(12) 共射極放大電路；(13) 射極隨耦電路；(14) 共基極定電流源電路；(15) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(16) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(17) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(18) 場效電晶體放大電路
(1) Introduction to basic instruments; (2) Thevenin Theorem; (3) RC phase shifting circuits; (4) RLC resonant circuits; (5) The characteristic curve of PN diode; (6) The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (7) Light Emitting Diode drivers; (8) Zener diode for voltage regulation; (9) The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (10) The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (11) DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (12) Common-Emitter (CE) amplifiers; (13) Emitter-follower (EF) circuits; (14) Common-Base (CB) constant current sources; (15) The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (16) The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (17) DC biasing circuits for FETs; (18) The amplifying circuits of FETs
